I wasn't on Friday because well my brother got my computer up from 60 
MBs of ram to 128 MBs.  There's no real difference though since I 
only have a Pentium II processor, but anyway I let him go online the 
rest of the day in exchange for the $20 worth of RAM.  And then 
Saturday I was supposed to go over to a friend's house and we and a 
few other people were going to work on a script for a short film of 
ours.

That fell through though so I just invited one of the friends over so 
we could work on the script and mess around with one of our new 
cameras.  Well, that friend spent 7+ hours online hitting on an 8th 
grader until she went out with him, (we're 9th) so that fell 
through.  Then we played Delta Force on three networked computers for 
about an hour.  We were going to work on above mentioned script but 
at 3 AM we couldn't think so we justed watched Wayne's World 2.  Then 
later that Sunday my brain felt like such a mess that I couldn't 
really concentrate.

So...anyway, the point of this long e-mail is to say my time is going 
to be gobbled up by the Time Chyort soon.  On one MUSH I have 
Romania, Los Angeles, and England to desc.  In way of school I have a 
ginormous math test due Wednesday that could bring my grade from a D 
to a B (a most excellent thought) and a German test Wednesday that 
basically determines my grade.  That'll be easy, except for the dang 
to have verb. 

And then while listening to AC/DC's Thunderstruck I just got the urge 
to work on a new TF fanfic series, and since it's been a few months 
since I've worked on any TF fanfics I feel I need to get moving on 
that.  So my time will be very, very spread out this week, but in one 
or two weeks my time should be less occupied.  Thankfully I'm not in 
anything too active in this RPG so I can still keep up with the 
posts.  But can ya please keep all this OOC stuff out that isn't 
important?

Also, I WILL respond to that Maximal City post, or die trying.

-Uni
